Libraries.name: nimcatapi
Libraries.desc: allows you to request images from the thecatapi and thedogapi.

Libraries.name: WebsiteGenerator
Libraries.desc: is a library that allows you to generate static HTML and CSS. The website you are seeing right now is, in fact, also generated using this library!

Applications.name: gitman
Applications.desc: is a cross-platform application to manage and update your cloned git repositories. Useful if you build software form source and want the repositories to be kept up-to-date on your system!

Applications.name: brainimfuck
Applications.desc: is a Brainfuck interpreter with built-in syntax checking and error highlighting.

Applications.name: CardGenerator
Applications.desc: lets you generate playing cards, while only focussing on the art and not the tedious work of manually compiling the final card image.

Applications.name: HzgShowAround
Applications.desc: is a website for the people in the "Herzogsägmühle" rehab, showing them around the place with the help of a map and keeping them up-to-date with the newsfeed.

Applications.name: FloppyBird
Applications.desc: is a basic FlappyBird clone written in Lua using the Love2D game engine.
